# shouldMaximizeConcurrentCompilation

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the device uses additional CPU threads for compilation tasks.

## Declaration

```swift
var shouldMaximizeConcurrentCompilation: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The property’s default value is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false]. You can retrieve the number of concurrent CPU threads the device is currently using by checking the [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLDevice/maximumConcurrentCompilationTaskCount] property.
